summary: This document is a financial statement for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details the account's assets, liabilities, and transactions for January 2019, including deposits, withdrawals, and interest income. The statement highlights the account's performance and provides insights into the financial activities of the entity. This document contains financial statements related to the UBS Business Services Account for Terramar Project, Inc. It details account activity for February 2019, including deposits, withdrawals, and account balances. The financial advisor associated with the account is Scott Stackman. This document contains financial statements and account activity for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details cash activity, deposits, withdrawals, and interest income for February 2019, along with the account's performance and investment objectives. This document contains financial statements and account information related to the Terramar Project, Inc., including account balances, transactions, and investment returns for March 2019. It highlights the financial activities and performance of the account managed by UBS Financial Services. This document contains financial statements for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details account balances, transactions, and investment objectives for March and April 2019, highlighting the account's performance and financial advisor information. It details account balances, transactions, and investment objectives for April 2019, highlighting cash flow, deposits, withdrawals, and interest income. This document contains financial statements and account details for the Terramar Project, Inc., including account balances, asset allocations, and transaction summaries for May 2019. It outlines the financial advisor's contact information and provides insights into the account's performance over the specified period. This document contains financial statements and account activity for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details account balances, transactions, and investment objectives for May 2019, including deposits, withdrawals, and interest earned. This document contains important information regarding financial statements and account management for the Terramar Project, Inc. It outlines account values, liabilities, and provides guidance on protecting against fraud. The document also includes contact information for financial advisors and details about account growth and sources of income. This document is a financial statement for the UBS Business Services Account associated with the Terramar Project, Inc. It details the account balance, cash activity, and investment objectives as of June 2019, including transactions and advisor information. This document contains financial statements related to the account of Terramar Project, Inc., detailing account balances, transactions, and financial advisor information. It highlights the account's performance over time, including deposits, withdrawals, and interest income. This document contains financial statements and account activity for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details account balances, transactions, and the financial advisor's information, indicating ongoing financial management and investment objectives. This document contains financial statements and account details for the Terramar Project, Inc. It outlines account balances, transactions, and investment objectives as of August 2019. The document highlights the importance of monitoring account activity and provides contact information for financial advisors. This document is a financial statement for the account of Terramar Project, Inc. at UBS Bank, detailing account activity, balances, and transactions for August 2019. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and fees, as well as the overall value of the account. This document is a financial statement for the account of Terramar Project, Inc., detailing cash balances, account activity, and investment objectives for September 2019. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and interest income, as well as the performance of the account over the year to date. This document contains financial statements for the account of Terramar Project, Inc. It details account activity, including deposits and withdrawals, as well as the account's balance and asset allocation as of October 31, 2019. The document highlights the importance of monitoring financial statements for fraud protection. This document contains financial statements for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details account balances, transactions, and investment objectives for October 2019. The document highlights the account's performance, including deposits, withdrawals, and interest earned. This document contains financial statements related to the 'TERRAMAR PROJECT, INC.' account, detailing account balances, transactions, and financial activity for November 2019. It includes information about assets, liabilities, and account management, highlighting the importance of monitoring financial statements for fraud protection. This document contains financial statements for the UBS Business Services Account associated with Terramar Project, Inc. It details account balances, transactions, and investment objectives for the period of November 2019. The financial activity includes deposits, withdrawals, and interest earned, along with the involvement of financial advisors Scott Stack and Lyle Casriel. This document contains financial statements for accounts associated with TERRAMAR PROJECT, INC and TERRAMAR PROTECT, INC for December 2019. It details account balances, cash activity, and investment objectives, highlighting the financial advisor Scott Stackman and the performance of various financial indices. This document contains important information regarding financial statements and account management for UBS clients. It outlines various terms and conditions related to account statements, investment options, and protections under financial regulations. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate reporting and communication regarding account activities.
